Structs/AccelerationsFile.html#/s:13Data.name: init()
Structs/AccelerationsFile.html#/s:13Data.abstract: Public initializer for external systems to access acceleration data.

Structs/AccelerationsFile.html#/s:13Data.name: load(from:)
Structs/AccelerationsFile.html#/s:13Data.abstract: Loads all Acceleration instances from the provided measurement. This accesses the file system to get the data from the local acceleration storage file.

Structs/ServerConnectionError.html#/s:13.name: handle(error:)
Structs/ServerConnectionError.html#/s:13.abstract: Handles a ServerConnectionError appropriately, by showing its details.

Structs/ServerConnectionError.html.name: ServerConnectionError
Structs/ServerConnectionError.html.abstract: A structure encapsulating errors used by server connections.

Structs/AccelerationsFile.html.name: AccelerationsFile
Structs/AccelerationsFile.html.abstract: Struct implementing the FileSupport protocol to store accelerations to a file in Cyface binary format.

Protocols/CoreDataMigratorProtocol.html#.name: requiresMigration(at:toVersion:inBundle:)
Protocols/CoreDataMigratorProtocol.html#.abstract: Checks if the provided store requires a migration to reach toVersion.

Protocols/CoreDataMigratorProtocol.html#.name: migrateStore(at:toVersion:inBundle:)
Protocols/CoreDataMigratorProtocol.html#.abstract: Migrates the provided store to the provided version.

Protocols/Cleaner.html#/s:13DataCapturin.name: clean(measurement:from:)
Protocols/Cleaner.html#/s:13DataCapturin.abstract: Cleans the database after a measurement has been synchronized.

Protocols/DistanceCalculationStrategy.ht.name: calculateDistance(from:to:)
Protocols/DistanceCalculationStrategy.ht.abstract: Calculate the distance in meters between the provided CLLocation instances.

Protocols/DistanceCalculationStrategy.ht.name: calculateDistance(from:to:)
Protocols/DistanceCalculationStrategy.ht.abstract: This is similar to calculateDistance(:CLLocation,:CLLocation) but accepts GeoLocationMO arguments.

Protocols/Authenticator.html#/s:13DataCa.name: authenticate(onSuccess:onFailure:)
Protocols/Authenticator.html#/s:13DataCa.abstract: Runs the authentication and calls the appropriate function onSuccess or onFailure when finished.

Protocols/Authenticator.html.name: Authenticator
Protocols/Authenticator.html.abstract: An Authenticator provides functionality to authenticate this app on a servoer for receiving the captured data.

Protocols/DistanceCalculationStrategy.ht.name: DistanceCalculationStrategy
Protocols/DistanceCalculationStrategy.ht.abstract: This protocol provides a way to calculate the distance between two geo locations in meters.

Protocols/Cleaner.html.name: Cleaner
Protocols/Cleaner.html.abstract: Implementations of this protocol are responsible for cleaning the database after a synchronization run.

Protocols/CoreDataMigratorProtocol.html.name: CoreDataMigratorProtocol
Protocols/CoreDataMigratorProtocol.html.abstract: A protocol implemented by classes responsible for migrating from old to new data models.

Enums/MeasurementContext.html#/s:13DataC.name: leisure
Enums/MeasurementContext.html#/s:13DataC.abstract: The measurement was taken during leisure time.

Enums/MeasurementContext.html#/s:13DataC.name: work
Enums/MeasurementContext.html#/s:13DataC.abstract: The measurement was taken while on the job or on the way to or from the job.

Enums/MeasurementContext.html#/s:13DataC.name: car
Enums/MeasurementContext.html#/s:13DataC.abstract: The measurement was taken driving a car.

Enums/MeasurementContext.html#/s:13DataC.name: bike
Enums/MeasurementContext.html#/s:13DataC.abstract: The measurement was taken riding a bicycle.

Enums/MeasurementContext.html#/s:13DataC.name: motorbike
Enums/MeasurementContext.html#/s:13DataC.abstract: The measurement was taken riding a motorbike.

Enums/DataCapturingError.html#/s:13DataC.name: isPaused
Enums/DataCapturingError.html#/s:13DataC.abstract: Thrown if the service was paused when it should not have been.

Enums/DataCapturingError.html#/s:13DataC.name: notPaused
Enums/DataCapturingError.html#/s:13DataC.abstract: Thrown if the service was not paused when it should have been.

Enums/DataCapturingError.html#/s:13DataC.name: isRunning
Enums/DataCapturingError.html#/s:13DataC.abstract: Thrown if the service was running when it should not have been.

Enums/DataCapturingError.html#/s:13DataC.name: notRunning
Enums/DataCapturingError.html#/s:13DataC.abstract: Thrown if the service was not running when it should have been.

Enums/DataCapturingError.html#/s:13DataC.name: noCurrentMeasurement
Enums/DataCapturingError.html#/s:13DataC.abstract: For some reason there was no current measurement to write data to or to read information to, during a capturing run. This can already happen during start up, if the current measurement was not created for some reason.

Enums/CoreDataMigrationVersion.html#/s:1.name: version1
Enums/CoreDataMigrationVersion.html#/s:1.abstract: The first and oldest version of the model.

Enums/FileSupportError.html#/s:13DataCap.name: notReadable(cause:)
Enums/FileSupportError.html#/s:13DataCap.abstract: This error is thrown if the file system was not readable.

Enums/DataCapturingEvent.html#/s:13DataC.name: geoLocationFixAcquired
Enums/DataCapturingEvent.html#/s:13DataC.abstract: Occurs everytime the DataCapturingService received a geo location fix and thus is able to track its position.

Enums/DataCapturingEvent.html#/s:13DataC.name: geoLocationFixLost
Enums/DataCapturingEvent.html#/s:13DataC.abstract: Occurs everytime the DataCapturingService loses its geo location fix.

Enums/DataCapturingEvent.html#/s:13DataC.name: geoLocationAcquired(position:)
Enums/DataCapturingEvent.html#/s:13DataC.abstract: Occurs each time the DataCapturingService receives a new geo location position.

Enums/DataCapturingEvent.html#/s:13DataC.name: lowDiskSpace(allocation:)
Enums/DataCapturingEvent.html#/s:13DataC.abstract: Occurs each time the application runs out of space.

Enums/DataCapturingEvent.html#/s:13DataC.name: serviceStarted(measurement:)
Enums/DataCapturingEvent.html#/s:13DataC.abstract: Used to notify the client application of a successful start of the DataCapturingService.

Enums/DataCapturingEvent.html#/s:13DataC.name: serviceStopped(measurement:)
Enums/DataCapturingEvent.html#/s:13DataC.abstract: Used to notify the client application of a successful stop of the DataCapturingService.

Enums/DataCapturingEvent.html#/s:13DataC.name: synchronizationFinished(measurement:)
Enums/DataCapturingEvent.html#/s:13DataC.abstract: Occurs if the DataCapturingService has finished synchronizing a measurement.

Enums/DataCapturingEvent.html#/s:13DataC.name: synchronizationStarted(measurement:)
Enums/DataCapturingEvent.html#/s:13DataC.abstract: Occurs when the synchronization of a measurement has started.

Enums/Status.html#/s:13DataCapturing6Sta.name: success
Enums/Status.html#/s:13DataCapturing6Sta.abstract: The status returned if an asynchronous callback has finished successfully.

Enums/Status.html#/s:13DataCapturing6Sta.name: error(_:)
Enums/Status.html#/s:13DataCapturing6Sta.abstract: The status returned if an asynchronous callback has finished with an error. Details about the error are available via the Error parameter.

Enums/Status.html.name: Status
Enums/Status.html.abstract: The status returned by asynchronous callback handlers.

Enums/DataCapturingEvent.html.name: DataCapturingEvent
Enums/DataCapturingEvent.html.abstract: Events occuring during capturing and transmitting data.

Enums/FileSupportError.html.name: FileSupportError
Enums/FileSupportError.html.abstract: Errors created by the Cyface SDK associated with accessing the file system.

Enums/CoreDataMigrationVersion.html.name: CoreDataMigrationVersion
Enums/CoreDataMigrationVersion.html.abstract: This is an enumeration of all version of the Cyface iOS data model used as part of the SDK.

Enums/DataCapturingError.html.name: DataCapturingError
Enums/DataCapturingError.html.abstract: An enumeration for all errors caused by capturing data.

Enums/MeasurementContext.html.name: MeasurementContext
Enums/MeasurementContext.html.abstract: The context of this measurement. This is application specific and might be something like the vehicle used.

Classes/MeasurementEntity.html#/s:13Data.name: identifier
Classes/MeasurementEntity.html#/s:13Data.abstract: The device wide unique identifier of this measurement.

Classes/MeasurementEntity.html#/s:13Data.name: measurementContext
Classes/MeasurementEntity.html#/s:13Data.abstract: The context of this measurement. This is application specific and might be something like the vehicle used.

Classes/MeasurementEntity.html#/s:13Data.name: init(identifier:context:)
Classes/MeasurementEntity.html#/s:13Data.abstract: Creates a new MeasurementEntity initializing all its properties to the provided values

Classes/StaticAuthenticator.html#/s:13Da.name: init()
Classes/StaticAuthenticator.html#/s:13Da.abstract: Default constructor needs to be publicly exposed to be able to create it.

Classes/CoreDataMigrator.html#/s:13DataC.name: init()
Classes/CoreDataMigrator.html#/s:13DataC.abstract: Public no argument constructor, so it becomes possible to create instances of this class.

Classes/DiskConsumption.html#/s:13DataCa.name: consumedBytes
Classes/DiskConsumption.html#/s:13DataCa.abstract: The amount of bytes currently used by the DataCapturingService.

Classes/DiskConsumption.html#/s:13DataCa.name: availableBytes
Classes/DiskConsumption.html#/s:13DataCa.abstract: The amount of bytes still available for the DataCapturingService.

Classes/AccelerationPointRemovalCleaner..name: init()
Classes/AccelerationPointRemovalCleaner..abstract: Public default constructor required to create instances of this class.

Classes/DeletionCleaner.html#/s:13DataCa.name: init()
Classes/DeletionCleaner.html#/s:13DataCa.abstract: Public default constructor required to create instances of this class.

Classes/Synchronizer.html#/s:13DataCaptu.name: syncOnWiFiOnly
Classes/Synchronizer.html#/s:13DataCaptu.abstract: A flag indicating whether synchronization of data should only happen if the device is connected to a wireless local area network (Wifi).

Classes/Synchronizer.html#/s:13DataCaptu.name: init(coreDataStack:cleaner:serverConnection:handler:)
Classes/Synchronizer.html#/s:13DataCaptu.abstract: Initializer that sets the initial value of all the properties and prepares the background synchronization job.

Classes/Synchronizer.html#/s:13DataCaptu.name: deinit
Classes/Synchronizer.html#/s:13DataCaptu.abstract: Makes sure background synchronization is stopped when this object dies.

Classes/Synchronizer.html#/s:13DataCaptu.name: syncChecked()
Classes/Synchronizer.html#/s:13DataCaptu.abstract: Tries to synchronize all measurements after checking for a proper connection. If syncOnWiFiOnly is true, this will only work if the device is connected to a WiFi network.

Classes/Synchronizer.html#/s:13DataCaptu.name: activate()
Classes/Synchronizer.html#/s:13DataCaptu.abstract: Starts background synchronization as prepared in this objects initializer.

Classes/GeoLocation.html#/s:13DataCaptur.name: latitude
Classes/GeoLocation.html#/s:13DataCaptur.abstract: The locations latitude coordinate as a value from -90.0 to 90.0 in south and north diretion.

Classes/GeoLocation.html#/s:13DataCaptur.name: longitude
Classes/GeoLocation.html#/s:13DataCaptur.abstract: The locations longitude coordinate as a value from -180.0 to 180.0 in west and east direction.

Classes/GeoLocation.html#/s:13DataCaptur.name: accuracy
Classes/GeoLocation.html#/s:13DataCaptur.abstract: The estimated accuracy of the measurement in meters.

Classes/GeoLocation.html#/s:13DataCaptur.name: speed
Classes/GeoLocation.html#/s:13DataCaptur.abstract: The speed the device was moving during the measurement in meters per second.

Classes/GeoLocation.html#/s:13DataCaptur.name: timestamp
Classes/GeoLocation.html#/s:13DataCaptur.abstract: The time the measurement happened at in milliseconds since the 1st of january 1970.

Classes/GeoLocation.html#/s:13DataCaptur.name: description
Classes/GeoLocation.html#/s:13DataCaptur.abstract: A human readable description of this object.

Classes/GeoLocation.html#/s:13DataCaptur.name: init(latitude:longitude:accuracy:speed:timestamp:)
Classes/GeoLocation.html#/s:13DataCaptur.abstract: The default constructor, which initializes all properties to the provided values.

Classes/ServerConnection.html#/s:13DataC.name: apiURL
Classes/ServerConnection.html#/s:13DataC.abstract: An URL used to upload data to. There should be a server available at that location.

Classes/ServerConnection.html#/s:13DataC.name: authenticator
Classes/ServerConnection.html#/s:13DataC.abstract: An object used to authenticate this app with a Cyface Collector server.

Classes/ServerConnection.html#/s:13DataC.name: init(apiURL:authenticator:onManager:)
Classes/ServerConnection.html#/s:13DataC.abstract: Creates a new server connection to a certain endpoint, using the provided authentication method.

Classes/ServerConnection.html#/s:13DataC.name: sync(measurement:onSuccess:onFailure:)
Classes/ServerConnection.html#/s:13DataC.abstract: Synchronizes the provided measurement with a remote server and calls either a success or failure handler when finished.

Classes/Acceleration.html#/s:13DataCaptu.name: timestamp
Classes/Acceleration.html#/s:13DataCaptu.abstract: The time in millisceonds since the 1st of january 1970, this acceleration was captured at.

Classes/Acceleration.html#/s:13DataCaptu.name: x
Classes/Acceleration.html#/s:13DataCaptu.abstract: Acceleration in the device x direction, which is towards the right side if the homebutton faces you.

Classes/Acceleration.html#/s:13DataCaptu.name: y
Classes/Acceleration.html#/s:13DataCaptu.abstract: Acceleration in the device y direction, which is towards the top of the device if the homebutton faces you.

Classes/Acceleration.html#/s:13DataCaptu.name: z
Classes/Acceleration.html#/s:13DataCaptu.abstract: Acceleration in the device z direction, which is standing on the screen pointing towards you if the homebutton faces you.

Classes/Acceleration.html#/s:13DataCaptu.name: init(timestamp:x:y:z:)
Classes/Acceleration.html#/s:13DataCaptu.abstract: The default constructor, which initializes all the properties of an Acceleration instance.

Classes/CyfaceBinaryFormatSerializer.htm.name: serializeCompressed(_:)
Classes/CyfaceBinaryFormatSerializer.htm.abstract: Serializes the provided measurement and compresses the returned data using RFC-1951 Deflate algorithm.

Classes/MovebisDataCapturingService.html.name: preCapturingLocationDelegate
Classes/MovebisDataCapturingService.html.abstract: The delegate that gets informed about location updates.

Classes/MovebisDataCapturingService.html.name: init(connection:sensorManager:updateInterval:savingInterval:dataManager:eventHandler:)
Classes/MovebisDataCapturingService.html.abstract: Creates a new MovebisDataCapturingService with the ability capture location

Classes/MovebisDataCapturingService.html.name: start()
Classes/MovebisDataCapturingService.html.abstract: Starts the capturing process, notifying the eventHandler, provided to the constructor of important events.

Classes/MovebisDataCapturingService.html.name: loadInactiveMeasurements()
Classes/MovebisDataCapturingService.html.abstract: Loads only those measurements that are not captured at the moment.

Classes/PersistenceLayer.html#/s:13DataC.name: context
Classes/PersistenceLayer.html#/s:13DataC.abstract: The current NSManagedObjectContext used by this persistence layer. This has to be reset if the layer is used on a different thread. If it is nil each method is going to use its own context, which can cause problems if model objects are used between those methods.

Classes/PersistenceLayer.html#/s:13DataC.name: delete(measurement:)
Classes/PersistenceLayer.html#/s:13DataC.abstract: Deletes the measurement from the data storag.

Classes/PersistenceLayer.html#/s:13DataC.name: load(measurementIdentifiedBy:)
Classes/PersistenceLayer.html#/s:13DataC.abstract: Loads the data belonging to the provided measurement in the background an calls onFinishedCall with the data storage representation of that measurement. Using that represenation is not thread safe. Do not use it outside of the handler.

Classes/PersistenceLayer.html#/s:13DataC.name: loadMeasurements()
Classes/PersistenceLayer.html#/s:13DataC.abstract: Loads all the measurements from the data storage.

Classes/PersistenceLayer.html#/s:13DataC.name: loadSynchronizableMeasurements()
Classes/PersistenceLayer.html#/s:13DataC.abstract: Loads only those measurements that have not been synchronized to a Cyface database yet and that are synchronizable at the moment.

Classes/PersistenceLayer.html#/s:13DataC.name: countMeasurements()
Classes/PersistenceLayer.html#/s:13DataC.abstract: Counts the amount of measurements currently stored in the data store.

Classes/PersistenceLayer.html#/s:13DataC.name: makeContext()
Classes/PersistenceLayer.html#/s:13DataC.abstract: Creates a new background NSManagedObjectContext for the current thread. This can be used to set an appropriate value for the context attribute.

Classes/PersistenceLayer.html#/s:13DataC.name: collectGeoLocations(from:)
Classes/PersistenceLayer.html#/s:13DataC.abstract: Collects all geo locations from all tracks of a measurement and merges them to a single array.

Classes/PersistenceLayer.html#/s:13DataC.name: extractIdentifiers(from:)
Classes/PersistenceLayer.html#/s:13DataC.abstract: Transforms a list of MeasurementMO objects to a list containing the identifiers.

Classes/DataCapturingService.html#/s:13D.name: isRunning
Classes/DataCapturingService.html#/s:13D.abstract: true if data capturing is running; false otherwise.

Classes/DataCapturingService.html#/s:13D.name: isPaused
Classes/DataCapturingService.html#/s:13D.abstract: true if data capturing was running but is currently paused; false otherwise.

Classes/DataCapturingService.html#/s:13D.name: currentMeasurement
Classes/DataCapturingService.html#/s:13D.abstract: The currently recorded Measurement or nil if there is no active recording.

Classes/DataCapturingService.html#/s:13D.name: locationUpdateRate
Classes/DataCapturingService.html#/s:13D.abstract: Locations are captured approximately once per second on most devices. If you would like to get fewer updates this parameter controls, how many events are skipped before one is reported to your handler. The default value is 1, which reports every event. To receive fewer events you could for example set it to 5 to only receive every fifth event.

Classes/DataCapturingService.html#/s:13D.name: init(sensorManager:updateInterval:savingInterval:dataManager:eventHandler:)
Classes/DataCapturingService.html#/s:13D.abstract: Creates a new completely initialized DataCapturingService accessing data a certain amount of times per second.

Classes/DataCapturingService.html#/s:13D.name: stop()
Classes/DataCapturingService.html#/s:13D.abstract: Stops the currently running or paused data capturing process or does nothing if the process is not

Classes/DataCapturingService.html#/s:13D.name: pause()
Classes/DataCapturingService.html#/s:13D.abstract: Pauses the current data capturing measurement for the moment. No data is captured until resume() has been called, but upon the call to resume() the last measurement will be continued instead of beginning a new now.

Classes/DataCapturingService.html#/s:13D.name: resume()
Classes/DataCapturingService.html#/s:13D.abstract: Resumes the current data capturing with the data capturing measurement that was running when pause() was called. A call to this method is only valid after a call to pause(). It is going to fail if used after start() or stop().

Classes/DataCapturingService.html#/s:13D.name: currentTimeInMillisSince1970()
Classes/DataCapturingService.html#/s:13D.abstract: Provides the current time in milliseconds since january 1st 1970 (UTC).

Classes/DataCapturingService.html#/c:@CM.name: locationManager(_:didUpdateLocations:)
Classes/DataCapturingService.html#/c:@CM.abstract: The listener method that is informed about new geo locations.

Classes/DataCapturingService.html#/c:@CM.name: locationManager(_:didFailWithError:)
Classes/DataCapturingService.html#/c:@CM.abstract: The listener method informed about error during location tracking. Just prints those errors to the log.

Classes/CredentialsAuthenticator.html#/s.name: authenticationEndpoint
Classes/CredentialsAuthenticator.html#/s.abstract: The location of the Cyface Collector API, used for authentication.

Classes/CoreDataManager.html#/s:13DataCa.name: setup(bundle:)
Classes/CoreDataManager.html#/s:13DataCa.abstract: Connects this CoreDataManager to the underlying storage, possibly migrating the data model to the current version.

Classes/CoreDataManager.html.name: CoreDataManager
Classes/CoreDataManager.html.abstract: A class for objects representing a CoreData stack.

Classes/CredentialsAuthenticator.html.name: CredentialsAuthenticator
Classes/CredentialsAuthenticator.html.abstract: An authenticator using a combination of username and password to authenticate against a Cyface data collector server.

Classes/DataCapturingService.html.name: DataCapturingService
Classes/DataCapturingService.html.abstract: An object of this class handles the lifecycle of starting and stopping data capturing.

Classes/PersistenceLayer.html.name: PersistenceLayer
Classes/PersistenceLayer.html.abstract: An instance of an object of this class is a wrapper around the CoreData data storage used by the capturing service. It allows CRUD operations on measurements, geo locations and accelerations.

Classes/DefaultDistanceCalculationStrate.name: DefaultDistanceCalculationStrategy
Classes/DefaultDistanceCalculationStrate.abstract: Calculates the distance between two locations based on the internal distance function provided by iOS.

Classes/MovebisDataCapturingService.html.name: MovebisDataCapturingService
Classes/MovebisDataCapturingService.html.abstract: A DataCapturingService implementation that provides the ability to capture locations

Classes/CyfaceBinaryFormatSerializer.htm.name: CyfaceBinaryFormatSerializer
Classes/CyfaceBinaryFormatSerializer.htm.abstract: Transforms measurement data into the Cyface binary format used for transmission via the network.

Classes/Acceleration.html.name: Acceleration
Classes/Acceleration.html.abstract: Represents one acceleration measurement carried out by the system.

Classes/ServerConnection.html.name: ServerConnection
Classes/ServerConnection.html.abstract: Realizes a connection to a Cyface Collector server.

Classes/GeoLocation.html.name: GeoLocation
Classes/GeoLocation.html.abstract: One geo location measurement provided by the system.

Classes/Synchronizer.html.name: Synchronizer
Classes/Synchronizer.html.abstract: An instance of this class synchronizes captured measurements from persistent storage to a Cyface server.

Classes/DeletionCleaner.html.name: DeletionCleaner
Classes/DeletionCleaner.html.abstract: A cleaner removing each synchronized measurement from the database completely.

Classes/AccelerationPointRemovalCleaner..name: AccelerationPointRemovalCleaner
Classes/AccelerationPointRemovalCleaner..abstract: A cleaner removing only the accelerations from each synchronized measurement, thus keeping the track information available.

Classes/DiskConsumption.html.name: DiskConsumption
Classes/DiskConsumption.html.abstract: Objects of this class represent the current disk (or rather SD card) space used and available.

Classes/CoreDataMigrator.html.name: CoreDataMigrator
Classes/CoreDataMigrator.html.abstract: An implementation of the CoreDataMigratorProtocol for the Cyface data model, as used by the Cyface iOS SDK.

Classes/StaticAuthenticator.html.name: StaticAuthenticator
Classes/StaticAuthenticator.html.abstract: A StaticAuthenticator always does authentication using the same Java Web Token (JWT).

Classes/MeasurementEntity.html.name: MeasurementEntity
Classes/MeasurementEntity.html.abstract: Represents one measurement carried out by the Cyface SDK.
